data.what_is:
Kizen helps enterprise leaders empower their teams with unprecedented autonomy, efficiency, and agility. Integrate with your current tech stack or power all of your data, sales, marketing, HR, and operations initiatives using Kizen as the heart of your enterprise.

SKYROCKET SALES PRODUCTIVITY & PREDICTABILITY.
Close more deals faster with suggested next best actions, predictive forecasts, and low performance alerts.

AI-DRIVEN, AUTO-DEPLOYED 1-TO-1 JOURNEYS.
Hyper-automated customer journeys that learn from every data point in your business.

IDENTIFY & HIRE STAR TALENT AT WARP SPEED.
AI-assisted HR administration to hire quickly, automate & adapt workflows, and retain your MVPs.

AI-ACCELERATED IT SUPPORT, DATA OPS, & APP CREATION.
Unified, centralized data plus a no-code interface allow you to launch in hours what used to take weeks.

MAXIMIZE EXPERIENCES & EFFICIENCY USING AUTOMATION.
Streamline workflows and manage, automate, & support initiatives in real-time using a single, no-code application.
data.product_description: KIZENs completely customizable, next-gen CRM is built to work the way you do. Automatic sync and perfect integrations with best-in-class apps for automation, marketing, and commerce help your team save time and maximize growth. Easily track deals or engagement, send emails or surveys, log activities or notes, and start automations with one click on any contact.START-TO-FINISH IMPLEMENTATION IN LESS THAN THREE MONTHS.Click-to-deploy industry-specific data models for machine learning, marketing emails, automated workflows, and more. Leaders who use Kizen achieve unprecedented time-to-value.MOVE FASTER BY ELIMINATING TRADITIONAL DEVELOPMENT CYCLES.When any team member you choose can build or modify applications in hours that used to take developers weeks or months, operational performance skyrockets.WE'RE NOT A HANDS-OFF VENDOR - WE'RE A PARTNER.From building platform-agnostic technology for universal integration to enabling the world's most customer-centric personalization: We're obsessed with your success.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 10 Kizen reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Data Enrichment
features.content: Uses external data sources to improve customer profiles.

features.name: Expandability
features.content: Can be updated to accept new sources and types of data.

features.name: Multiple Devices
features.content: Can engage with customers across any device with a consistent message.

features.name: Marketing Metrics
features.content: Provides analysis of marketing program ROI and efficiency.

features.name: Predictive Modeling
features.content: Predicts outcomes based on statistical models; can give insight to "what-if" scenarios.

features.name: Recommendation Engine
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence to provide suggestions based on desired outcomes.

features.name: Opportunity Identification
features.content: Highlights cross-sell, upsell, and white space opportunities

features.name: Zero-touch Renewals
features.content: Can fully automate the deal renewal process

features.name: Smart Content
features.content: Suggests content appropriate to stage and tone of the deal

features.name: Flexible Sales Process
features.content: Can operate under at least two distinct sales methodologies

features.name: Training Mode
features.content: Includes recording and review capabilities to train new salespeople or review old deals

features.name: Playbooks
features.content: Creates and stores multiple playbooks for sales

features.name: Multiple Org Charts
features.content: Allows multiple relationship maps for each account and opportunity

features.name: Stakeholder Roles
features.content: Includes explicit definitions of stakeholder roles

features.name: Revenue History
features.content: Allows users to track how previous revenue forecasts have developed over time

features.name: Pipeline Management
features.content: Allows users to track pipeline to identify deals that are stalled, at risks and future opportunities

features.name: Dashboard Analytics
features.content: Reports results on revenue attainment, conversion rate, and overall revenue analytics

features.name: Multi-Device Data Visualization
features.content: Allows users to view data visualizations on several devices

features.name: Data Segmentation
features.content: Enables user to segment customer or prospect revenue data in meaningful ways such as by industry or region.

features.name: Predictive Forecasting
features.content: Provides users with ability to predict upcoming forecast based on AI insights and deal health

features.name: Revenue Operations Cadence
features.content: Provides users with ability to analyze weekly, monthly, and quarterly operational cadences to ensure success

features.name: Calendar Sync
features.content: Automatically associates calendar invites to update deal progress in a CRM

features.name: Email Activity Capture
features.content: Automatically associates sales activities within emails to the relevant accounts in your CRM

features.name: Conversation Intelligence
features.content: Automatically associates sales activities within conversation intelligence tools to the relevant accounts in your CRM

features.name: Marketing Leads
features.content: Automatically links marketing leads to sales generated opportunities in your CRM

features.name: Contact Capture
features.content: Automatically captures contacts engaged with and associates to relevant accounts in a CRM

features.name: Nonengaged Accounts
features.content: Identifies accounts that sales reps aren't engaging with

features.name: Account optimization
features.content: Maximizes account coverage by determining the optimal number of accounts per rep

features.name: Historical Patterns
features.content: Identifies common themes among historical deals that are won or lost

features.name: Rep Performance
features.content: Identifies common themes and actions amongst reps that close the most deals

features.name: Account Engagement
features.content: Allows users to track the level of engagement with each account and provides insights on frequency of engagement

features.name: Historical Win/Loss Patterns
features.content: Identifies common themes among historical deals that are won or lost to provide insights into successful strategies

features.name: Custom Fields
features.content: Allows users to add custom fields to forms that aren't already on the templates

features.name: Conditional Logic
features.content: Enables forms to hide or show certain fields based on respondents' answers

features.name: Multi-page Forms
features.content: Allows users to create forms with more than one page

features.name: Design
features.content: Gives users the ability to customize the design of forms (e.g. logo, brand colors, fonts, etc.)

features.name: Embedded Forms
features.content: Enables forms to be embedded onto a website without having to create code from scratch

features.name: Offline Capability
features.content: Can used without an internet connection

features.name: Notifications
features.content: Sends notifications when a completed form is recieved

features.name: Payments
features.content: Contains integrations with payment processors, enabling users to accept payments through forms

features.name: Mobile Forms
features.content: Allows users to build, distribute and access forms from a mobile device

initial_reviews.review_title: Agile CRM tool with excellent customer service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
We are able to customize and adjust the system, forms, displays, and more to fit our business needs. As the company grows, we can tweak Kizen to be what we need, instead of fitting ourselves into what the product offers. Also, the sucker service is spectacular. From custom build outs to how-to videos, to regular check ins, it really feels like the Kizen team wants to make the system work for us in every way.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
I think there could be a bit more flexibility in reporting services. I'd love to be able to easily export my dashboards as a PDF to share with team members who don't use the system. I'd also like the ability to create my own visual representations of our data similar to how tableau works, instead of just the options in the tool.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Kizen for several different functions. We maintain our customer database, track our deals/purchase orders, and now create/send our marketing updates. It is our central "source of truth" for all things sales/marketing related.

From custom build outs to how-to videos, to regular check ins, it really feels like the Kizen team wants to make the system work for us in every way.

initial_reviews.review_title: Kizen for Coworking Spaces
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
Kizen provides fully customizable automation, flexibility, user data, and process for our member journey and sales pipeline. Forms for our building walkthroughs/upkeep easy search bar function, and activities dashboard to track our KPIS.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
It can be a bit laggy, and multiple activities and automation can be triggered (It might be more of a user error though)  Error code 404 often.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kizen is helping us by storing and gathering data for our members, so we can make decisions based on the data we collect. Through automation, we have set up a process so incoming members get everything they need before they are even onsite. The team is assigned specific activities associated with their role and their part of the member journey process.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great tool to save time for small architecture firm
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
We love the ability to track time and invoice clients with automations set up for different types of clients with email templates based on hourly/lump sum projects (used to use Excel). We also appreciate the reminder emails to follow up with clients on their invoices and reminder to bill active projects.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
Getting the automations and email templates set up and then working out the bugs for different client types took some time, but it's been smooth sailing since then.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation of invoicing and database for sending out marketing info. The product has reduced time spent logging time, creating invoices, and ensuring we send out reminder emails to get paid in a timely manner.

initial_reviews.review_title: KIZEN is easy to use and powerful!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
KIZEN does everything I need from a lead management service and more.  It's automations are super helpful for tracking lead status and requesting updates from my team.  I really enjoy using the email and form builders as well.  Customer service is amazing as well.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
It can be pricy if you have a large team.  I have also had a tough time navigating some of the settings areas on the website, but eventually was able to figure out where everything was located.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping me track leads from various sources and keep a current status for each entry.  It also notifies my team to update leads via automation that I created.

initial_reviews.review_title: Kizen Application Review
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
What I liked the best about the Kizen software application is the fact that the app creates curated trainings for all of my team members on a variety of subjects.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
What I disliked the most about the Kizen software application is the fact that sometimes the training software that the team used could sometimes be a little bit muddled and the UI or user interface was not as clear as it tc could have been.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problems I solved most frequently with the Kizen software application is the ways in which we can train our team, especially new team members en-masse with different courses so that they can get up to speed and learn about different areas of the company.

initial_reviews.review_title: the marketing automation software
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
Platform is easy to use and the user interface is very intuitive. You do need experience for using it.  The customer support is very great as well, they support you always whenever you reach them. It enables viewing contact records and dashboard to other teams as well. You can make personal meetings or virtual calls easily. You can schedule activities. It can easily be accessed from your phone too. It has helped us a lot. The functionality is great. It provides marketing, customer management and sales benefits in all in one platform.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
The premium plan of kizen is very expensive, you cannot afford it if you are running small business. Dashboard need some improvements as well. The structure of software needs to be improved too. The new platform does not have some of its good features. You still need some learning curve but yes, the support team is very helpful so we can neglect this one. There are still a few improvements needs to be done.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking a better software to collect, store and access the data of customer for our sales team and yes, this CRM helped us a lot in this. we have now customizable dashboards to do all these activities. It is good but expensive. It is easy to use so our sales team learnt it in few days. Our team has loved using this CRM and it has been a wonderful experience so far.

initial_reviews.review_title: Extremely intuitive tool that has greatly enhanced our team's productivity
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
Kizen has improved collaboration among our team, increased productivity, and allowed us to gain better insight into our business.  Our team had been using Salesforce for 4+ years and ended up having to pay for additional third-party applications to piece together a solution that still didn't work perfectly for us.  The transition to Kizen from Salesforce was seamless, and the Kizen team was there to walk us through it every step of the way.  We have been nothing short of impressed with Kizen's best-in-class product suite and team.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
As of now, we have been completely satisfied with Kizen.

Recommendations to others considering Kizen:
I would highly recommend switching to Kizen - it has met and exceeded all of our expectations.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Kizen to manage our business development efforts, making sure we are staying in front of all the right prospects.  Kizen's ease of use has led to more team members actually using the CRM, thus allowing for more accurate reporting and insights.  As we accumulate more data in Kizen, we plan to utilize Kizen's automation tools to drive further productivity improvements.

initial_reviews.review_title: Flexible, Powerful CRM with Strong UI
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
Kizen is an intuitive CRM that is easy to use without much prior experience. The timeline that tracks all communication with individual clients is essential when dealing with many clients over an extended period of time. We are a non-profit, and the sales pipelines also make it easy to track multiple donors in process.

Kizen has worked really well for us. When we do run into snags, they are quick in responding with technical support via online chat. Friendly people!

What do you dislike about Kizen?
We are unusual in that we often need to import contacts from an outside source. There is no feature to prevent automatically overriding contact information if the email address is the same. It would be nice if it would throw a warning, and offer the option to replace/merge/skip. (I doubt, however, most business would have the same need of this feature as we do.)

Recommendations to others considering Kizen:
Consider what the areas are that are absolutely essential needs, and check around. Our primary considerations: cost, ease of use, strong UI, great tracking of client interactions, pipelines. Eventually we will use the automations and product sales features, but for now can't speak to those.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kizen makes it simple to communicate with a large constituent base. There is infinite segmenting of clients, which makes targeted communication a breeze. We keep fairly extensive information on our clients, and Kizen is highly customizable in the kinds of information that we can track.

For me, the best part of Kizen is the sheer amount of functionality this platform has. As a small business owner, I can manage my marketing, sales, and customer service (incl. retention efforts) in one place.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
I can't pinpoint a "dislike" - I have, of course, requested additional features, but the team has been both quick to respond and quick to push those requests!

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Besides the "all-in-one" aspect, I'm really enjoying Kizen's behavioral tracking. I didn't truly have this with other business software I've used. Being able to cater to different contacts based on not only their demographics, but also on their behavior has been HUGE for my business.

all_reviews.review_title: Agile CRM tool with excellent customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
We are able to customize and adjust the system, forms, displays, and more to fit our business needs. As the company grows, we can tweak Kizen to be what we need, instead of fitting ourselves into what the product offers. Also, the sucker service is spectacular. From custom build outs to how-to videos, to regular check ins, it really feels like the Kizen team wants to make the system work for us in every way.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
I think there could be a bit more flexibility in reporting services. I'd love to be able to easily export my dashboards as a PDF to share with team members who don't use the system. I'd also like the ability to create my own visual representations of our data similar to how tableau works, instead of just the options in the tool.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Kizen for several different functions. We maintain our customer database, track our deals/purchase orders, and now create/send our marketing updates. It is our central "source of truth" for all things sales/marketing related.

all_reviews.review_title: Kizen for Coworking Spaces
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
Kizen provides fully customizable automation, flexibility, user data, and process for our member journey and sales pipeline. Forms for our building walkthroughs/upkeep easy search bar function, and activities dashboard to track our KPIS.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
It can be a bit laggy, and multiple activities and automation can be triggered (It might be more of a user error though)  Error code 404 often.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kizen is helping us by storing and gathering data for our members, so we can make decisions based on the data we collect. Through automation, we have set up a process so incoming members get everything they need before they are even onsite. The team is assigned specific activities associated with their role and their part of the member journey process.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to save time for small architecture firm
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
We love the ability to track time and invoice clients with automations set up for different types of clients with email templates based on hourly/lump sum projects (used to use Excel). We also appreciate the reminder emails to follow up with clients on their invoices and reminder to bill active projects.

What do you dislike about Kizen?
Getting the automations and email templates set up and then working out the bugs for different client types took some time, but it's been smooth sailing since then.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation of invoicing and database for sending out marketing info. The product has reduced time spent logging time, creating invoices, and ensuring we send out reminder emails to get paid in a timely manner.

Kizen e muito bom em integrar vendas de marketing e clientes podem ser gerenciados de uma forma mais avancada, como pode adicionar as informacoes relacionadas a eles nas informacoes do cliente. Os contatos tambem estao agora sob nossa supervisao. Tambem podemos fazer uma ligacao atraves dele o que facilitou muito para nos fazermos um relacionamento saudavel e tambem a disponibilidade de reunioes virtuais com uma unica pessoa tambem e incrivel. A caracteristica mais atraente deste software de CRM e seu painel de controle, que e altamente confiavel e seguro e tambem nos tornou capazes de acompanhar o painel de outras equipes. O gerenciamento de vendas e gerenciamento de clientes agora pode ser feito usando um unico software.

A facilidade de chamadas e reunioes virtuais e muito util, pois nos permitiu estabelecer um relacionamento solido com nossos clientes. Seu painel e outra coisa incrivel sobre ele. Sem duvida e um software que economiza tempo, mas e muito dificil para nos.

all_reviews.review_content:

It has an interface that is quite easy to adapt, so it allows me to use it in a much simpler and more efficient way, its performance (from my point of view) is great, it has helped me change the way I managed to do it. Proper management of clients, allowing me to include information in the system about the contact details of my clients, the fact that I put at my disposal tools and functionalities that help to consolidate the digital marketing strategies of my company is something exceptional, since In this way, I can improve the way my campaigns are executed in a much more personalized and complete way in conjunction with my clients' data, which allows me to segment my campaigns according to the needs of each client, their Reports are quite useful to make decisions in a more effective and faster way, so for me it is a very good application for the integral management of clients and marketing

What do you dislike about Kizen?
The only thing I could complain about is the price, it is very expensive, however it is worth every penny of what it costs.

all_reviews.review_title: Flexible, Powerful CRM with Strong UI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kizen?
Kizen is an intuitive CRM that is easy to use without much prior experience. The timeline that tracks all communication with individual clients is essential when dealing with many clients over an extended period of time. We are a non-profit, and the sales pipelines also make it easy to track multiple donors in process.

Kizen has worked really well for us. When we do run into snags, they are quick in responding with technical support via online chat. Friendly people!

What do you dislike about Kizen?
We are unusual in that we often need to import contacts from an outside source. There is no feature to prevent automatically overriding contact information if the email address is the same. It would be nice if it would throw a warning, and offer the option to replace/merge/skip. (I doubt, however, most business would have the same need of this feature as we do.)

Recommendations to others considering Kizen:
Consider what the areas are that are absolutely essential needs, and check around. Our primary considerations: cost, ease of use, strong UI, great tracking of client interactions, pipelines. Eventually we will use the automations and product sales features, but for now can't speak to those.

What problems is Kizen solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kizen makes it simple to communicate with a large constituent base. There is infinite segmenting of clients, which makes targeted communication a breeze. We keep fairly extensive information on our clients, and Kizen is highly customizable in the kinds of information that we can track.
